name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA)
hydrogen peroxide (HP)
acetic acid (AA)
1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP)
and optionally dipicolinic acid (DPA)
and/or sodium hydroxide (NaOH)
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA) (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (AA) (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), 1-hydroxyethylidene-1,1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP) (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4), and optionally dipicolinic acid (DPA) (CAS Reg. No. 499-83-2) and/or sodium hydroxide (NaOH) (CAS Reg. No. 1310-73-2). REPLACES FCN 1426
